sectionDeptRestriction: Restricted to students in the Psychology department.
sectionNotes: Restricted to students with Senior class standing.
sectionText: Senior priority enrollment begins November 2nd. Junior priority enrollment begins November 9th. Sophomores priority enrollment begins November 14th.Freshman on November 16th. Open enrollment begins at 10am on November 21st.  **Approved for General Concentration**  For Spring 2017: experiments include VIRTUAL REALITY (3D skiing & motion perception), PRISM ADAPTION (see the world upside-down with inversion goggles), VISUAL ILLUSIONS (slope illusion), and ATTENTION (visual search). For more information and prerequisites see http://publish.illinois.edu/franceswang/psych334/ or contact instructor (Frances Wang, wang18@illinois.edu)
